We've previously made a tool for this it was specific to a particular 
project and is not part of our standard ARCReader.

I believe others have made such tools too, but I'm unsure of any to 
particularly recommend right now.

Can you say more about why you want to do this? Can't you perform 
whatever processing is necessary on the data inside the (W)ARC files?

- Gordon @ IA

Steve Webb wrote:
> 
>

> structure like the mirror writer stores them so I don't have to write 
> one myself?  :)
